analysis: Market analysis indicates strong upward momentum with multiple bullish confirmations. RSI at 64.53 remains in neutral territory. Money Flow Index at 61.56 suggests balanced volume distribution. MACD showing trend transition, awaiting confirmation. Price maintaining above Bollinger middle band, uptrend intact. Price structure supports bullish continuation with MA and SAR confirmation. Ichimoku cloud analysis supports bullish bias.
